description:
"American Horror Story: Coven's" witchy premiere conjured up the most-watched broadcast for the "AHS" franchise since its inception two years ago, earning 5.54 million total viewers and 3.87 million viewers in the adults 18-49 demo. 《美国恐怖故事：女巫集会》首播集成为该剧开播2年以来收看人数最多的一集，当晚共有554万人观看了这一集，其中18-49岁的主要收视人群人数为387万。

This is a gain of 44 percent in total viewers and 39 percent in the demo over the "American Horror Story: Asylum" premiere from October 2012. When the final Live+7 day data becomes available, the "Coven" premiere could be the most-watched program in FX history.这个成绩比该剧第二季《美国恐怖故事：疯人院》增长了44%，比第二季在去年10月的首播集高出了37%。如果算上全周数据的话，这可能会是FX电视台史上收视最高的一部剧。

"American Horror Story: Coven" airs Wednesday nights at 10 p.m. ET/PT on FX.《美国恐怖故事：女巫集会》将会在FX电视台每周三晚10点播出（北京时间每周四上午）。
